item.title: 印度首席执行官数月施压后习近平与莫迪取得突破
item.description: 2020 年的边境冲突造成至少 20 名印度士兵死亡后，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪采取了一系列措施阻止来自中国的投资，甚至在某些领域比美国走得更远。现在，新德里已经意识到他可能做得太过分了。【原文：After a 2020 border clash killed at least 20 Indian soldiers, Prime Minister Narendra Modi took a range of steps to block investment from China, even going further than the US in some areas. Now there’s a recognition in New Delhi that he may have gone too far.】

item.title: 铂金股权投资支持的英迈公司首次公开募股（IPO）获得 4.09 亿美元融资
item.description: 2024年9月16日，星期一，美国纽约，纽约证券交易所（NYSE）。为本周美联储决议做准备的华尔街交易员们继续推动科技大盘股轮番出局，而科技大盘股一直是股市牛市的动力。摄影师：Yuki Iwamura/Bloomberg【原文：The New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) in New York, US, on Monday, Sept. 16, 2024. Photographer: Yuki Iwamura/Bloomberg】

item.title: 债券收益率上升，黄金从历史新高回落后上扬
item.description: 黄金在创下 11 周来最大单日跌幅后小幅上涨，原因是国债收益率上升拖累了金价，投资者在接近历史最高水平时抛售。【原文：Gold rose slightly after its biggest daily drop in 11 weeks, as higher Treasury yields weighed on prices and investors sold near record-high levels.】

item.title: 在两极分化的世界中，巴西不愿在中美之间做出选择
item.description: 在这个日益两极分化的世界上，巴西领导人正在走一条精细的外交路线，既要吸引美国和中国，又要保护自己的国家免受任何潜在的打击。【原文：Brazilian leaders are walking a fine diplomatic line to appeal to both the US and China and shield their nation from any potential blowback in an increasingly polarized world.】

item.title: 石油价格下跌后趋于平稳，供应前景和中东局势成为关注焦点
item.description: 由于交易商对中东紧张局势和进入 2025 年的市场平衡前景进行了评估，石油在周三回落后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied, after retreating on Wednesday, as traders assessed tensions in the Middle East and the outlook for market balances heading into 2025.】

item.title: 香港 IPO 使中国软件大亨的财富增至近 10 亿美元
item.description: 据余凯的导师之一沃尔克-特雷斯普（Volker Tresp）教授介绍，余凯在慕尼黑大学攻读计算机科学博士学位期间，是一位雄心勃勃的研究人员，他表明自己希望成为该领域的佼佼者。【原文：While studying for his computer science Ph.D. at the University of Munich, Kai Yu stood out as an ambitious researcher who showed he wanted to be a top name in his field, according to Professor Volker Tresp, one of his supervisors.】

item.title: 首席财务官称加州大学捐款突破 40 亿美元
item.description: 加州大学首席财务官内森-布罗斯特罗姆（Nathan Brostrom）在周三的一次会议上表示，加州大学系统在上一财年首次获得了超过 40 亿美元的私人捐款。【原文：The University of California system brought in more than $4 billion in private donations for the first time during the last fiscal year, Nathan Brostrom, its chief financial officer, said at a conference on Wednesday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将下跌，日元在走软后持稳：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市出现回落，而国债收益率则推高了美元，因为交易商缩减了对美联储减息的押注。【原文：Equities in Asia were primed for a pullback, while Treasury yields pushed the dollar higher as traders scaled back bets on Federal Reserve cuts.】

item.title: 矿产资源公司的埃里森面临澳大利亚监察机构的调查
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监督机构正在调查矿产资源有限公司及其富豪创始人克里斯-埃里森（Chris Ellison），原因是他未申报付款以避税。【原文：Australia’s corporate watchdog is investigating Mineral Resources Ltd. and its tycoon founder, Chris Ellison, after he made undeclared payments that avoided tax.】

item.title: 英超联赛面临英国政府前所未有的监管
item.description: 新的足球监管机构将有权决定英格兰利润丰厚的英超联赛如何向小俱乐部分配资金，从而使监管机构对这项全国最受欢迎的运动拥有更大的控制权。【原文：A new football regulator will have the power to decide how England’s lucrative Premier League distributes money to smaller clubs, giving the regulator greater control over the country’s most popular sport.】

item.title: 图格说，肯尼亚准备在当前水平捍卫先令
item.description: 肯尼亚中央银行行长卡马乌-图格（Kamau Thugge）说，先令在今年取得了举世瞩目的涨幅后，目前正处于适当的水平，决策者准备动用创纪录的外汇储备来保护货币。【原文：Kenyan Central Bank Governor Kamau Thugge said the shilling is at appropriate levels after its world-beating gains this year, and that policy makers are prepared to use record foreign reserves to defend the currency.】

item.title: 激进股东称，Dye & Durham 需要新经理人，而非出售

item.title: 随着近海业务下滑趋势的缓解，Transocean 正在与竞争对手 Seadrill 讨论合并事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Transocean Ltd.正在与竞争对手海上钻井承包商 Seadrill Ltd.洽谈合并事宜，而此时世界各地的石油勘探者正在重返海洋。【原文：Transocean Ltd. is in talks to merge with rival offshore drilling contractor Seadrill Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter, just as oil explorers around the world are returning to the sea.】

item.title: 纽蒙特因黄金暴涨而实现 2019 年以来最大季度盈利

item.title: 美国要求七国集团考虑对俄罗斯钯和钛实施制裁
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士说，美国要求七国集团盟国考虑对俄罗斯的钯和钛实施制裁，因为拜登政府正在酝酿新的办法来压制弗拉基米尔-普京总统的战争机器。【原文：The US asked Group of Seven allies to consider sanctions on Russian palladium and titanium, a person familiar with the matter said, as the Biden administration mulls fresh ways to squeeze President Vladimir Putin’s war machine.】

item.title: T-Mobile 增加移动和宽带用户，上调业绩预期
item.description: T-Mobile US Inc. 公布的移动电话和宽带月度用户数量超出分析师预期，因此该公司上调了今年的新客户和盈利预期。【原文：T-Mobile US Inc. reported more monthly mobile-phone and broadband subscribers that analysts expected, leading it to raise forecasts for new customers and earnings this year.】

item.title: 咨询业务销售疲软拖累业绩，IBM业绩下滑
item.description: 国际商业机器公司（International Business Machines Corp. ）受咨询需求放缓的影响，第三季度营收不尽如人意，在尾盘交易中下跌达 8%。【原文：International Business Machines Corp. declined as much as 8% in late trading after the company reported underwhelming revenue in the third quarter, hurt by a slowdown in consulting demand.】

item.title: 特斯拉因交付量增长而实现超预期利润
item.description: 特斯拉公司第三季度的盈利超过了华尔街的预期，并预计今年的交付量将略有增长，这反映了市场对其电动汽车需求的反弹。【原文：Tesla Inc. surpassed Wall Street estimates for earnings in the third quarter and projected a slight increase in deliveries for the current year, reflecting a rebound in demand for its electric vehicles.】

item.title: Roblox 将实施儿童安全改革，赋予家长更多控制权
item.description: 受青少年欢迎的视频游戏平台 Roblox 公司在其儿童安全政策受到广泛批评以及涉嫌使用该服务虐待儿童者被捕后，正在进行一系列改革。【原文：Roblox Corp., the video-game platform popular with preteens, is instituting a number of reforms following widespread criticism of its child-safety policies and the arrests of alleged child abusers using the service.】

item.title: 考克斯西班牙首次公开募股预计于 11 月进行，公司等待监管机构批准
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Cox Abg Group SA 预计将在下个月为其首次公开募股定价，因为该公司正在等待西班牙证券监管机构的批准，以启动股票销售。【原文：Cox Abg Group SA expects to price its initial public offering next month, as it awaits approval from the Spanish securities regulator to launch the share sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 佛罗里达养老金将卸载多达 40 亿美元的私人信贷
item.description: 据知情人士透露，佛罗里达州行政委员会正在寻求出售一捆价值高达 40 亿美元的私人信贷股权，这将是同类交易中最大的交易之一。【原文：The Florida State Board of Administration is looking to sell a bundle of private credit stakes worth as much as $4 billion in what would be one of the largest deals of its kind, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 并非人人都在享受无着陆经济
item.description: 美国经济不景气？实际上，如果你看一下最新的民意调查，大多数美国人感觉自己的经济状况比四年前大流行病最严重的时候更糟。虽然党派之争和通货膨胀挥之不去的影响肯定与此有关，但现实情况是，美国经济在富人和穷人之间存在着明显的鸿沟。【原文：No-landing US economy? Well actually, if you look at the latest polls, the majority of Americans feel worse off than they did four years ago at the height of the pandemic. And while partisanship and the lingering effects of inflation certainly have a lot to do with it, the reality is that there’s a stark divide in the US economy between haves and have-nots.】

item.title: BMO 表示，IPO 的复兴可能在 2025 年推动 500 亿美元的新交易
item.description: 蒙特利尔银行资本市场（BMO Capital Markets）的资深银行家表示，明年美国首次公开募股市场有望加速发展，有可能将此类交易量推向四年来的新高。【原文：The market for US initial public offerings is expected to accelerate next year, according to senior bankers at BMO Capital Markets, potentially pushing the volume of such deals to a four-year high.】

item.title: 受托人称 Synapse 冻结的资金将在年底前归还
item.description: 据法院指定受托人 Jelena McWilliams 称，在银行即服务提供商 Synapse Financial Technologies Inc. 破产期间被冻结的约 2 亿美元消费者资金的剩余部分应于 12 月返还给客户。【原文：The remainder of the roughly $200 million of consumer funds frozen during the bankruptcy of banking-as-a-service provider Synapse Financial Technologies Inc. should be returned to customers in December, according to court-appointed trustee Jelena McWilliams.】
